about.presentation: I'm Jean-Paul, a full-stack web developer 💻 with a strong educational background in software engineering. I am doing freelance work 🚀 based in Paris 🇫🇷, but I do work remotely for international clients.

etna.degree: Master of Science · Software architect, application developer
etna.school: École des Technologies Numériques Appliquées (ETNA) · France 🇫🇷

interest1.title: Jobs
interest1.content: If you want to hire me, I'm interested to work in companies that offer modern technologies such as Node.js, Vue.js, Express.js, MongoDB, etc. I am looking for a role that challenges me.

interest2.title: Travel
interest2.content: I love traveling, especially to cities. I love when a city is vibrant and full of diversity. It might not be a surprise that one of my favorite places on Earth is Paris.

interest3.title: Technology
interest3.content: I'm fascinated by technological advances which companies such as Google, Tesla, Apple make.

interest4.title: Startups & Companies
interest4.content: I have a big entrepreneurial and startup curiosity which is devided in two fields. On one hand, small companies which try to make it big. On the other hand, I like following strategic moves and happenings in big players such as Google, Netflix, Spotify.

interest5.title: Coding
interest5.content: This is a classic cliché. After (or before) work, I enjoy some coding on the side. I am currently exploring Ionic and diving deeping in the internal workings of Vue.js in order to be able to contribute to the projects.

interest6.title: Cinema & TV
interest6.content: I love almost any kind of movie, but I always prefer DC Comics and Marvel movies. As of TV: I enjoy The Witcher (one of my favorites), GoT, Homeland, Murder, among others. I also like to watch football games on weekends when I can't go to the stadium and occasionally I do a bit of jogging (If you want to engange in lengthy conversations with me, these are the way to go.)

contact.title: Let's talk
contact.interest: Whether you are interested to do business with me, want to chat about some of my content, or just want to hangout, I am happy to talk to you.
contact.other: Feel free to check out my social media presence below to get to know me better
contact.email: My preferred way of contact is via
